metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12142 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: In ytnef 1.9.2, an invalid memory read vulnerability was found in the function SwapDWord in ytnef.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

notes.Note: leosilva> the issue resides in ytnefprint/main.c that is not present in trusty.

criterions.comment: libytnef: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
